enrollment-volume-debugging.userFacingDescription: This rollout will be used to asses the total population reachable through Nimbus. It has no user experience changes.

firefox-accounts-toolbar-button-default-.userFacingName: Firefox Accounts toolbar button default visibility - new users
firefox-accounts-toolbar-button-default-.userFacingDescription: This experiment measures the impact of showing the Firefox Accounts toolbar button by default for signed-out users.

next-generation-accessibility-engine-pow.userFacingName: A next generation accessibility engine powering screen readers and other ATs
next-generation-accessibility-engine-pow.userFacingDescription: Evaluating a major re-architecture of Firefox's accessibility engine to improve performance of screen readers and other assistive technologies.

task-continuity-sync-after-tab-change-ro.userFacingName: Task Continuity - Sync after tab change Rollout 40%
task-continuity-sync-after-tab-change-ro.userFacingDescription: Increase frequency of syncing after tab changes
